title: Nim's Island Font???
content:
I'm going crazy here trying to find out what font was used for the Nim's Island title... any ideas? At first I was curious, but now since I really can't find it, I'm on a mission to find out..

Help!
author: dcsimi

comments.content:
Hi John,

this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215091412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nim_4487.png)
  
I’d say this is custom.  
F

edit: crosspost with florian

there's not a font quite like this ... it's either built-from-scratch (custom) or  
a font heavily modified (customized)

if it is customized, it might be a titling face such as New Horizon Titling

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/new-horizon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215091412/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/new-horizon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/new-horizon/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215091412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nim_3429.jpg)

You could get in contact with Mojohouse ... Mojo did the Nim's Island movie posters. They might have been working with key art created by someone else.

[http://www.mojohouse.com/contact/emails.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215091412/http:/www.mojohouse.com/contact/emails.html "http://www.mojohouse.com/contact/emails.html")
wow!! thanks soo much.. very informative.. i had exhausted google... thanks!
